title: If the President is sentenced to treason, has everyone else been removed from office?
subtitle: Some confusion about the meaning and process of dismissal has led to the dissemination of false information about the possible consequences of treason charges against the President of the United States.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: If the President of the United States is sentenced to treason, the Vice-President and all other officers will also be automatically removed from office.
